Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Trim tab actuator binding. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Landing Gear component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 30/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer
